Package orange.task

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
orange.task.TaskList
public class TaskList extends Object
Manages a list of tasks using the singleton pattern. This class allows adding, updating, deleting, and listing tasks.
See Also:
  • Task

      Parameters:

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(int taskNumber, Task newTask) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Updates a task at the specified index in the task list.
      Parameters:
      taskNumber - The index of the task to update.
      newTask - The new task to replace the old one.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the task number is out of bounds.

    • deleteTask

      public void deleteTask(int taskNumber) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Deletes a task at the specified index in the task list.
      Parameters:
      taskNumber - The index of the task to delete.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the task number is out of bounds.

    • listTasks

      public void listTasks()
      Lists all tasks in the task list with their respective numbers.

    • getTasks

      public ArrayList<Task> getTasks()
      Retrieves a copy of the task list to prevent external modification.
      Returns:
      A copy of the task list.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Retrieves the number of tasks in the task list.
      Returns:
      The size of the task list.

    • updateCompletionStatus

      public void updateCompletionStatus(int taskNumber, boolean status) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Updates the completion status of a task at a given index.
      Parameters:
      taskNumber - The index of the task to update.
      status - The new completion status of the task.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the task number is out of bounds.
